queries.query: SELECT u.senha AS senha FROM Usuario u WHERE email = @Email;
SELECT u.id_usuario AS idUsuario, u.email AS email, u.nome AS nome, u.sobrenome AS sobrenome, u.telefone AS telefone, u.senha AS senha FROM Usuario u WHERE email = @Email;
SELECT u.id_usuario AS idUsuario, u.email AS email, u.nome AS nome, u.sobrenome AS sobrenome, u.telefone AS telefone FROM Usuario u WHERE u.id_usuario = @idUsuario;

SELECT m.id_musica AS idMusica, m.nome AS nome, m.duracao_ms AS duracao FROM avaliacao_usuario au JOIN musica m ON au.id_musica = m.id_musica WHERE au.gostou = TRUE AND au.id_usuario = @idUsuario ORDER BY m.nome;
SELECT uhb.busca AS busca, uhb.data_busca AS data, uhb.id_usuario AS idUsuario FROM usuario_historico_buscas uhb WHERE uhb.id_usuario = @idUsuario ORDER BY uhb.data_busca DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT m.id_musica AS idMusica, m.nome AS nome, m.duracao_ms AS duracao FROM avaliacao_usuario au JOIN musica m ON au.id_musica = m.id_musica WHERE au.gostou = FALSE AND au.id_usuario = @idUsuario ORDER BY m.nome;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM usuario;
SELECT id_administrador AS idUsuario FROM administrador WHERE id_administrador = @idUsuario
